"Complete a certain Client Order.":
"Emergency call to all ARKS.
The [Profound Darkness] and Dark Falz
[Double] have appeared over Naberius.
[Double] is protecting the [Profound
Darkness], so we must engage it first.
Destroy all hostiles and end this threat.
――――――――――――――――――――
Failure: Fail objective, time limit expires"

"You'll be transported to the front
soon. Your objective is to forge a
path to the [Profound Darkness]
by destroying Dark Falz [Double]."

"This enemy Dark Falz...
We cannot begin to fathom the
depths of its power. Be careful,
and, please, come back to us
safe and sound..."

"You've opened a path to the
[Profound Darkness]. All that
remains is for you to take
down this powerful foe."

"We have no detailed orders or
instructions for you. Fight bravely,
and make it through this alive...
That's an order. That is an order!"
